about_the_game:
The sewers of the Dark Tower are unlocked, where you will encounter challenging survival and adventure tests!

  • Procedurally generated terrain: The map is no longer fixed! The game dynamically generates the surrounding map as the player moves, a new experience every time!
  • Endless enemies: The Demon Lord's Curse will constantly refresh monsters around you, expanding your territory as much as possible so you don't get stuck.
  • Strengthen your bombs and weapons: Like the main tower of the Dark Tower, you still need to build your reinforcement cards to upgrade your bombs and weapons and find unique combinations of ideas.
  • Go off the beaten path: Stick to enough levels in the sewers and you'll have a chance to face the Devil directly!
detailed_description:
The sewers of the Dark Tower are unlocked, where you will encounter challenging survival and adventure tests!

  • Procedurally generated terrain: The map is no longer fixed! The game dynamically generates the surrounding map as the player moves, a new experience every time!
  • Endless enemies: The Demon Lord's Curse will constantly refresh monsters around you, expanding your territory as much as possible so you don't get stuck.
  • Strengthen your bombs and weapons: Like the main tower of the Dark Tower, you still need to build your reinforcement cards to upgrade your bombs and weapons and find unique combinations of ideas.
  • Go off the beaten path: Stick to enough levels in the sewers and you'll have a chance to face the Devil directly!

name: 黑暗塔 - 移动迷宫 (The Dark Tower - Move Maze)
short_description: This is a new mode for The Dark Tower! Build your own dungeon in a fully dynamic map, changing it with every step you take!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
